name: Melting Point (William Anderson)
description:
Melting Point is an action puzzle game I've been working on for some time now. Currently it's in early access with only levels (1-4) playable, while I expand on all the final levels for the game, but you'll get a good idea where it is going :-)

How to Play: Run your Fire Sprite through the many puzzle levels and clear out as much Ice as you can, while keeping an eye on your health, for each Ice Block will cost you one unit of health, while Blue Ice will cost you two.

If you get trap, then you didn't solve the level puzzle correctly.  When this happens, and it will, just press ESC and restart the level again, for you can play each level as many times as you like.
